description:
There are no rain delays on the playground. Outfitted with RunShield™ water-resistant technology the Peregrine 12s aren’t afraid of a little rain. For trails, playgrounds or gymnasiums, these runners offer great traction and support.

  • Alternate Closure (A/C) edition uses a hook-and-loop strap and elastic laces, so there are no laces to tie, leaving more time for fun
  • RunShield water resistant technology helps keep feet dry
  • Anti-microbial treatment helps keep the funk to a minimum
  • Recycled PET liners wick moisture away from the foot
  • Compression molded EVA midsole offers comfortable, all day support
  • Non-marking sole is great for polished gym floors and school hallways
  • Aggressive tread pattern bites into soft terrain and offers solid traction on hard surfaces
name: Saucony Peregrine 12 Shield A/C Shoes - Children
